### Problem 8.1
Construct a graphics frame-- ggplot()

Add a layer of glyphs -- ylab()

Set an axis label -- xlim()

Divide the frame into facets -- facet_grid()

Change the scale for the frame -- scale_y_log10()

###Problem 2 

a).
```{r}

CPS85%>%
ggplot(aes(x=wage, color=sex, fill=sex))+
  geom_density(alpha=0.4)+
  facet_grid(~married)+
  xlim(0,30)+
  theme_bw()

```

b).
```{r}
CPS85 %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = age, y = wage)) +
  geom_smooth(aes(group = sex, color = sex))+
  facet_grid( ~ married)
```






c).

```{r}
CPS85 %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = age, y = wage)) +

  geom_smooth(aes(group = sex, color = sex))+
  ylim(0,25)+

  facet_wrap( ~ sector)
  
 
```
